https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/moyB6dB3MoR8f1xrTrrBZLYJU49.jpg Fictional story based on Sarah Bernhard's visit to Brazil in 1905. The actress, experiencing a personal and professional crisis at the time, is induced by her personal Brazilian maid, Amélia, to make a performance in Rio de Janeiro. After arriving, she is forced to stand the company of Amélia's exotic sisters. Amélia
